code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{db}from"../firebase";import{collection,addDoc}from"firebase/firestore";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AddBook(){const[title,setTitle]=useState("");const[author,setAuthor]=useState("");const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await addDoc(collection(db,"books"),{title,author});setTitle("");setAuthor("");alert("Book added!");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Add a New Book"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Title",className:"form-control mb-2",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Author",className:"form-control mb-2",value:author,onChange:e=>setAuthor(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Add Book"})]})]});}export default AddBook;
